body.name: ASUS Chromebook Flip CM3, 12" Touchscreen NanoEdge Display, MediaTek Kompanio 820 T8192, Arm NATT MC5 GPU, 64GB eMMC, 4GB RAM, Wi-Fi 5, Chrome OS, Silver CM3200FM1A-DH01T (Renewed)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 14 hrs 2 mins
features: The ASUS Chromebook Flip CM3 is powered by the MediaTek Kompanio 820 (8192) 2.2 GHz, delivering great performance for all tasks.
The ASUS Chromebook Flip CM3 comes equipped with 64GB eMMC storage and 4GB LPDDR4X RAM, to store all of your valuable data, photos and learning materials.

Featuring a 12-inch display with a 3:2 aspect ratio and thin bezels, the ASUS Chromebook Flip CM3 provides an expanded view in the portrait orientation to inspire you to see the world from a new perspective.

The 360° ErgoLift hinge on ASUS Chromebook Flip CM3 allows it to be used in Tablet mode, Laptop mode, Tent mode or Flat mode — so it’s ideal for browsing websites, completing tasks and sharing content easily with friends and colleagues.
The ASUS Chromebook Flip CM3 has full I/O support with a Combo Audio Jack, USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A port, USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C ports, and a MicroSD card reader (*USB Transfer speed may vary).

The ASUS Chromebook Flip CM3 runs on Chrome OS: this easy-to-use operating system was designed to be fast in every possible way, while keeping you safe and more secure on the web. Get more done with Chromebook. Use built-in apps like Google Docs and Google Calendar or download productivity apps on Google.
body.description: ASUS Chromebook Flip CM3200 strikes the balance between work and play. The 360° hinge enables multiple modes and provides the versatility to work or study using the orientation that you like best. Featuring a 12-inch display with a 3:2 aspect ratio and thin bezels, ASUS Chromebook Flip CM3 provides an expanded view in the portrait orientation to inspire you to see the world from a new perspective. The ultra-portable design and long-lasting battery life are tailored to an on-the-go lifestyle, and the silky-smooth palm rests and ErgoLift hinge design ensure comfort when typing. With vast storage and a rich library of apps, ASUS Chromebook Flip CM3 opens up a whole new world of freedom!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Chromebook and an Excellent Value
reviews.reviewText: I bought this chromebook several weeks ago and have been using it pretty steadily without any issue whatsoever. The issue of whether there was a stylus included or not did not matter to me so this was a non-issue.The chromebook came and I checked out the case and keyboard immediately. The case looked like it was brand new and had no scuffs, dings or imperfections of any kind. Also the keyboard was in excellent condition as well as the trackpad.The performance of the chromebook is first rate and works well for me. I am not a gamer so cannot speak to that but it works fine for streaming videos, watching Youtube, reading ebooks and composing and reading emails. Excellent job all around.Finally the video display is excellent and there are no dropped pixels and colors are very vivid. Only negative I would say it that the audio could be louder but I do have a bluetooth speaker and earbuds so not much of an issue for me.Overall, considering the price, I am extremely pleased with the chromebook and would definitely recommend it to others and would definitely buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Don't expect the pen/stylus to come with it!
reviews.reviewText: When reading the description and everything it clearly states that any renewed or refurbished products will come with all accessories included when bought new. May not be original accessories but will be compatible either way, which was fine with me. I specifically bought this Chromebook for my son's digital art so the stylus was kind of important and I'm pretty annoyed there wasn't one. Chromebook also could've been cleaned a little better but whatever. Otherwise was well packaged in a new cardboard box and seems to be working well. Will update once my son actually uses it.
